title: Chapter 500 - An Evil Spirit
volume_title: Sword Qi Fills The Autumn Skies
body:
Chapter 500 - An Evil Spirit

Clang!

The zither music came to an abrupt halt. Weng Jiu’s hands stilled on the strings, and his expression shifted.

Huo Tiandu’s Dragon-Binding Slash was so overbearing that he couldn’t help but sweat on Su Yi’s behalf. How could he possibly stay in the mood to play the zither?

Boom!

The cage of Azure Spring Sword Intent repeatedly shrank, like blades surging inward from all sides, intent on suppressing and slaughtering the person trapped within the cage. 

There was nowhere to run and nowhere to hide.

Just watching from afar, the onlookers couldn’t help but feel their hearts give into despair. 

However, the person trapped within the cage couldn’t help but laugh derisively and shake his head. “If this is your strongest attack, I’m deeply disappointed.”

As soon as his voice rang out, the Abstruse God Sword burst with dazzling radiance, and he slashed horizontally in front of him.

Rumble!

Five sword mountains stretched into the sky, tall beyond limit. They were vast, majestic, and boundless. 

The Great Five Elements Suppression Domain Sword!
